entry.title: Geometry and topology of symplectic resolutions
entry.summary: This is an overview of math.AG/0310186, math.AG/0309290, math.AG/0501247, math.AG/0401002 and math.AG/0504584 written for the Proceedings of the AMS Meeting on Algebraic Geometry, Seattle, 2005.
entry.arxiv:comment: 29 pages, LaTeX2e. Final version to be published by the AMS

entry.title: Quasi-unipotence of overconvergent F-crystals
entry.summary: Building on our previous papers (math.AG/0102173, math.AG/0105244, math.AG/0106192) we prove that every overconvergent F-isocrystal over k((t)) is quasi-unipotent (in the sense of Crew), for k a field of positive characteristic.

entry.title: Flat Vector Bundles over Parallelizable Manifolds
entry.summary: We study flat vector bundles over complex parallelizable manifolds.

entry.title: This is withdrown
entry.summary: This paper is withdrown

entry.title: Flops connect minimal models
entry.summary: A remark on a paper by Birkar-Cascini-Hacon-McKernan.

entry.title: A product formula for volumes of varieties
entry.summary: A simple application of the semipositivity.

entry.title: Intersection lattices of cubic fourfolds
entry.summary: We study the lattices of algebraic and transcendental cycles of cubic fourfolds.

entry.title: Lectures notes in universal algebraic geometry
entry.summary: Lectures notes in universal algebraic geometry for beginners

entry.title: Motivic splitting principle
entry.summary: A variation on the splitting principle

entry.title: Motives of derived equivalent K3 surfaces
entry.summary: We observe that derived equivalent K3 surfaces have isomorphic Chow motives.

entry.title: Threefolds
entry.summary: This is an example on the cohomology of threefolds.

entry.title: A simple proof of stability of Fourier-Mukai transform
entry.summary: Paper is withdrawn due to errors (superseded by math.AG/0604303). Formula 6.5 is false. Section 6 is false, and the main statement is true only for bundles $B$ with $c_1(B)$ SU(2)-invariant.

entry.title: Witten's top Chern class on the moduli space of higher spin curves
entry.summary: This paper is a sequel to math.AG/0011032. Its goal is to show that Witten's "top Chern class" constructed in loc.cit. satisfies all the axioms of math.AG/9905034.

entry.title: The TeichmÃ¼ller group is good
entry.summary: This paper was withdrawn by the authors. The mistake in math.AG/0209223 affects also this paper.
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been withdrawn. The mistake in math.AG/0209223 affects also this paper

entry.title: Syzygies of projective toric varieties
entry.summary: This paper has been subsumed by math.AG/0502240
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been subsumed by math.AG/0502240

entry.title: An automorphic form related to cubic surfaces
entry.summary: This is a note constructing a certain weight 4 automorphic form on the moduli space of cubic surfaces, posted here because it is referred to in math.AG/0002066

entry.title: The (-1) twist
entry.summary: We extend the results of the eprint math.AG/0204256, obtained with Herb Clemens, about sections of nonnegative twists of the canonical bundle of subvarieties of generic hypersurfaces, to the case of the (-1) twist.

entry.title: Modularity of equations D3 and the Iskovskikh classification
entry.summary: This paper has been superseded by math.AG/0510287 and withdrawn by the author.

entry.title: Schubert Calculus according to Schubert
entry.summary: We try to understand and justify Schubert Calculus the way Schubert did it.
entry.arxiv:comment: 17 pages in english, 7 figures. This is the english, extended version of a previously posted preprint math.AG/0409281

entry.title: On Exceptional Collections on Grassmannians
entry.summary: The author was informed that the result in the original version had been obtained earlier by K. Ueda (arXiv:math/0503355 [math.AG]). The paper is retracted.

entry.title: A Remark on a Theorem of math.AG/0511155
entry.summary: We give another proof of a theorem of H. Kajiura, K. Saito, and A. Takahashi based on the theory of weighted projective lines by Geigle and Lenzing and a theorem of Orlov on triangulated categories of graded B-branes. The content of this paper appears in the appendix to math.AG/0511155.
entry.arxiv:comment: The content of this paper appears in the appendix to math.AG/0511155

entry.title: Reducible Families of Curves with Ordinary Multiple Points on Surfaces in Projective Three-Space
entry.summary: In math.AG/0108089, math.AG/0212090 and math.AG/0308247 we gave numerical conditions which ensure that an equisingular family is irreducible respectively T-smooth. Combining results by Greuel, Lossen and Shustin and an idea from math.AG/9802009 we give in the present paper series of examples of families of irreducible curves on surfaces in projective three-space with only ordinary multiple points which are reducible and where at least one component does not have the expected dimension. The examples show that for families of curves with ordinary multiple points the conditions for T-smoothness in math.AG/0308247 have the right asymptotics.

entry.title: On extra components in the functorial compactification of A_g
entry.summary: A short note that contains some Cliff's notes of the general theory (see math.AG/9905103) but concentrates on one of the stranger aspects of it - existence of other irreducible components.

entry.title: Mirror Principle IV
entry.summary: This is a continuation of "Mirror Principle III"(math.AG/9912038).
entry.arxiv:comment: 23 pages, plain tex; uncomment listtoc and writetoc to get table of content; typos corrected

entry.title: Algebraic construction of Witten's top Chern class
entry.summary: We give a construction of Witten's "top Chern class" on the compactified moduli space of curves with higher spin structures and show that it satisfies most of the axioms proposed in math.AG/9905034.

entry.title: Bloch-Kato conjecture and main conjecture of Iwasawa theory for Dirichlet characters
entry.summary: This is the completely revised version of math.AG/0101071.

entry.title: Intersection complexes of fans and toric varieties
entry.summary: In the article math.AG/0102085, Lemma 5.5 was false. Hence the decomposition theorem (Theorem 5.8) and all statements in Section 7 are not proved.

entry.title: Erratum to the paper: Compact hyperkaehler manifolds: basic results
entry.summary: This is an Erratum to the paper: Compact hyperkaehler manifolds: basic results. (alg-geom/9705025, Inv. math. 135). We give a correct proof of the projectivity criterion for hyperkaehler manifolds. We use a recent result of Demailly and Paun math.AG/0105176.

entry.title: Classification of three-dimensional exceptional log canonical hypersurface singularities II
entry.summary: In this paper the detailed classification of three-dimensional exceptional canonical hypersurface singularities which don't satisfy the condition of well-formedness is given. This result completes the classification of three-dimensional exceptional log canonical hypersurface singularities started in [4] (math.AG 0201025).

entry.title: Comments on toric varieties
entry.summary: Here are few notes on not necessarily normal toric varieties and resolution by toric blow-up. These notes are independent of, but in the same spirit as the earlier preprint arXiv:math.AG/0306221. That is, they focus on the fact that toric varieties are locally given by monoid algebras.

entry.title: Supplement to: Goncharov's Relations in Bloch's higher Chow Group CH^3(F,5)
entry.summary: This is a supplement to the paper "Goncharov's Relations in Bloch's higher Chow Group CH^3(F,5)" submitted as math.AG/0105084. We check the admissiblility of all the cycles appearing in the main article.

entry.title: Universal triple Massey products on elliptic curves and Hecke's indefinite theta series
entry.summary: Generalizing math.AG/0003076 we express universal triple Massey products between line bundles on elliptic curves in terms of Hecke's indefinite theta series. We show that all Hecke's indefinite theta series arise in this way.

entry.title: Integral affine structures on spheres III: complete intersections
entry.summary: We extend our model for affine structures on toric Calabi-Yau hypersurfaces math.AG/0205321 to the case of complete intersections.
entry.arxiv:comment: 11 pages, 4 figures. Uses color. See http://www.math.duke.edu/~haase/ and http://abel.math.harvard.edu/~zharkov/

entry.title: The six operations for sheaves on Artin stacks II: Adic Coefficients
entry.summary: In this paper we develop a theory of Grothendieck's six operations for adic constructible sheaves on Artin stacks continuing the study of the finite coefficients case in math.AG/0512097.

entry.title: Equimultiple locus of embedded algebroid surfaces and blowing--up in arbitrary characteristic
entry.summary: This paper extends previous results of the authors, concerning the behaviour of the equimultiple locus of algebroid surfaces under blowing--up, to arbitrary characteristic.
entry.arxiv:comment: Submitted. Superseeds our previous paper math.AG/0703579

entry.title: Gorenstein locus of minuscule Schubert varieties
entry.summary: In this article, we describe explicitely the Gorenstein locus of all minuscule Schubert varieties. This proves a special case of a conjecture of A. Woo and A. Yong (see math.AG/0603273) on the Gorenstein locus of Schubert varieties.

entry.title: Corrigendum to our paper: Birational transformations of weighted graphs
entry.summary: We give a corrected version of Corollary 3.33 in: H. Flenner, S. Kaliman, and M. Zaidenberg, Birational transformations of weighted graphs. Affine algebraic geometry. Osaka Univ. Press, 2007, 107-147.

entry.title: Simple normal crossing varieties with prescribed dual complex
entry.summary: We prove that every simplicial complex is the dual complex of some simple normal crossing divisor in a smooth variety. As an application, we simplify and extend the results of Kapovich--Koll\'ar (math.AG:1109.4047) on the existence of singularities with given dual complex.

entry.title: On algebraic mixed Hodge substructures of H^2
entry.summary: This paper has been superseded to a great extent by the following: Paper: math.AG/0511558 Title: The Neron-Severi group of a proper seminormal complex variety Authors: L. Barbieri-Viale, A. Rosenschon & V. Srinivas Paper: math.AG/0102150 Title: Deligne's Conjecture on 1-Motives Authors: Luca Barbieri-Viale, Andreas Rosenschon, Morihiko Saito Journal-ref: Ann. of Math. (2), Vol. 158 (2003), no. 2, 593--633

entry.title: The equivariant Toda lattice, II
entry.summary: Applying recent ideas of Carlet, Dubrovin and Zhang (to appear), who, following a suggestion of Eguchi and Yang (hep-th/9407134), study the logarithm of the Lax operator of the Toda lattice, we show that the equivariant Toda lattice introduced in math.AG/0207025 is a Hamiltonian integrable system.

entry.title: Gromov-Witten theory of Deligne-Mumford stacks
entry.summary: Long ago, in math.AG/0112004, we pledged more details on the algebraic version of Chen-Ruan's math.AG/0103156. This is it.
entry.arxiv:comment: 59 pages, 9 sections, 3 appendices and one figure. Several minor improvements

entry.title: Perverse sheaves on Artin stacks
entry.summary: In this paper we develop the theory of perverse sheaves on Artin stacks continuing the study in "The six operations for sheaves on Artin stacks I: Finite Coefficients" and "The six operations for sheaves on Artin stacks II: Adic Coefficients" (math.AG/0512097 and math.AG/0603680)

entry.title: A model for the orbifold Chow ring of weighted projective spaces
entry.summary: We construct an isomorphism of graded Frobenius algebras between the orbifold Chow ring of weighted projective spaces and graded algebras of groups of roots of the unity.
entry.arxiv:comment: The main result of this paper was briefly stated in our preprint math.AG/0610617 (version 1). Here we explain the construction in detail and give complete proofs. The preprint math.AG/0610617 has been updated (version 2) and this result is removed

entry.title: Tropical theta characteristics
entry.summary: This note is a follow up of math.AG/0612267v2 and it is largely inspired by a beautiful description of Baker-Norine of non-effective degree (g-1) divisors via chip-firing game. We consider the set of all theta characteristics on a tropical curve and identify the Riemann constant as a unique non-effective one among them.
entry.arxiv:comment: 4 pages, still an addendum to math.AG/0612267v2, exposition improved, description of positive theta added

entry.title: Absolutely simple Prymians of trigonal curves
entry.summary: Using Galois Theory, we construct explicitly absolutely simple (principally polarized) Prym varieties that are not isomorphic to jacobians of curves even if we ignore the polarizations. Our approach is based on the previous papers math/0610138 [math.AG] and math/0605028 [math.AG] .

entry.title: Harmonic analysis and the Riemann-Roch theorem
entry.summary: This paper is a continuation of papers: arXiv:0707.1766 [math.AG] and arXiv:0912.1577 [math.AG]. Using the two-dimensional Poisson formulas from these papers and two-dimensional adelic theory we obtain the Riemann-Roch formula on a projective smooth algebraic surface over a finite field.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages; to appear in Doklady Mathematics

entry.title: Nodal complete intersection threefold with defect
entry.summary: In this paper we show that a nodal complete intersection threefold $X$ in $\mathbb{P}^{3+c}$ with defect, but without induced defect, has at least $\sum_{i\leq j} (d_i-1)(d_j-1)$ nodes, provided either $c=2$ or $d_c>\sum_{i=1}^{c-1} d_i$ holds.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is a modified version of the second part of arXiv:1310.0227v1 [math.AG]. The corresponding part has been left out of arXiv:1310.0227 [math.AG]

entry.title: On quantum cohomology rings of partial flag varieties
entry.summary: The main goal of this paper is to give a unified description for the structure of the small quantum cohomology rings for all homogeneous spaces of SL_n(C).

entry.title: Algebraic theory of characteristic classes of bundles with connection
entry.summary: This is a survey on the topic explained in the title, for the proceedings on the K-theory 1997 summer institute in Seattle.

entry.title: On maximal curves having classical Weierstrass gaps
entry.summary: We study geometrical properties of maximal curves having classical Weierstrass gaps.

entry.title: Degeneration of curves and analytic deformation
entry.summary: Let C_1 and C_2 be two degenerations of genus g curves. We prove that if two degenerations defines the same conjugacy classes in the mapping class group, they are equivalent under analytic deformations.

entry.title: Morse groups in symmetric spaces corresponding to the symmetric group
entry.summary: We describe the Morse groups of the nearby cycles sheaves on the nilcones in three classical symmetric spaces.

entry.title: M_g is a union of g-1 affine open subsets
entry.summary: Paper withdrawn. (Lemma 2.1 is false.)
entry.arxiv:comment: LaTeX2e, 9 pages. Paper withdrawn. (Lemma 2.1 is false.)

entry.title: Klein's group defines an exceptional singularity of dimension 3
entry.summary: We construct two examples of canonical exceptional singularities.

entry.title: Normal surfaces with strictly nef anticanonical divisors
entry.summary: In this paper we study normal surfaces whose anticanonical divisors are strictly nef, i.e. (-K)C>0 for every curve C.

entry.title: Contact structures on algebraic 5-dimensional manifolds
entry.summary: In this note we study contact structures on 5-dimensional manifolds. We give a complete answer under the assumption that the Abundance conjecture holds in dimension 5.

entry.title: Eulogy for Andrew Wiles
entry.summary: The text of an oration to present Prof Andrew Wiles for the degree of Doctor of Science, Honoris Causa, at the University of Warwick

entry.title: On Boris Moishezon's multiple planes
entry.summary: The text of the talk on Workshop on Topology of Algebraic Varieties in honour of Boris Moishezon, Bonn, MPI, Monday July 27, 1998.

entry.title: Subvarieties of C^n with non-extendible Automorphisms
entry.summary: We investigate algebraic and analytic subvarieties of C^n with automorphisms which can not be extended to the ambient space.

entry.title: Tamagawa numbers on diagonal cubic surfaces, numerical evidence
entry.summary: We test numerically the refined Manin's conjecture about the asymptotics of points of bounded height on Fano varieties for some diagonal cubic surfaces.

entry.title: Miranda-Persson's problem on extremal elliptic K3 surfaces
entry.summary: We compute Mordell-Weil groups for extremal semistable elliptic fibrations of K3 surfaces

entry.title: On the extension problem of pluricanonical forms
entry.summary: We review some recent development on the extension problem of pluricanonical forms from a divisor to the ambient space in [Si], [K5] and [N3] with simplified proofs.

entry.title: Cycle groups for Artin stacks
entry.summary: We construct an algebraic homology functor for Artin stacks of finite type over a field, and we develop intersection-theoretic properties.

entry.title: Notes on 2D Conformal Field Theory and String Theory
entry.summary: We explain the basics of conformal theory using the language of chiral algebras of Beilinson and Drinfeld.

entry.title: Singularities of Rational Curves on K3 surfaces
entry.summary: We proved that every rational curves in the primitive class of a general K3 surface of any genus is nodal.

entry.title: Lieux de dÃ©gÃ©nÃ©rescence (Degeneracy loci)
entry.summary: We prove Lefschetz type theorems for cohomology groups and Picard groups of degeneracy loci for vector bundle maps. We also treat the case of antisymmetric maps.
entry.arxiv:comment: In French. 21 pages. PlainTeX v 1.2; typeset for references

entry.title: Gonality, Clifford index and multisecants
entry.summary: We show, among other things, that in most cases the gonality of a subcanonical curve in projective-three space is computable by multisecants.

entry.title: Quiver varieties of type A
entry.summary: Improvements in the exposition.

entry.title: Multiplicities of Points on Schubert Varieties in Grassmannians
entry.summary: We obtain an explicit determinantal formula for the multiplicity of any point on a classical Schubert variety.

entry.title: Jacobian of meromorphic curves
entry.summary: The contact structure of two meromorphic curves gives a factorization of their jacobian.
entry.arxiv:comment: 41 pages, amstex, to be published in the Proceedings of the Indian Academy of Sciences

entry.title: Applications of Kawamata's positivity theorem
entry.summary: In this paper we treat some applications of Kawamata's positivity theorem. We get a weak answer to \cite [Section 3]{KeMaMc}. And we investigate the singularities on the target spaces of some morphisms.

entry.title: Addendum to: On fibre space structures of a projective irreducible symplectic manifold
entry.summary: In this note, we prove that every fibre space structures of a projective irreducible symplectic manifold is a lagrangian fibration.

entry.title: Bogomolov's Conjecture for Hyperelliptic Curves over Function Fields
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove the Effective Bogomolov's Conjecture for hyperelliptic curves defined over function fields.

entry.title: Hirzebruch Surfaces: Degenerations, Related Braid Monodromy, Galois Covers
entry.summary: We describe various properties of Hirzebruch surfaces and related constructions: degenerations, braid monodromy, Galois covers and their Chern classes.
entry.arxiv:comment: 2 files: TEX file of text and file of figures

entry.title: Deformations of weak Fano 3-folds with only terminal singularities
entry.summary: In this article, we prove that any $\Bbb Q$-factorial weak Fano 3-fold with only terminal singularities has a smoothing.

entry.title: Quantum Hyperplane Section Principle for Concavex Decomposable Vector Bundles
entry.summary: The quantum hyperplane section theorem is explained for nonnegative decomposable concavex bundle spaces over generalized flag manifolds.

entry.title: The Steinberg Curve
entry.summary: We construct 0-cycles on the product of 2 elliptic curves, which are not detectable by Bloch's analytic motivic cohomology.

entry.title: Equivariant Singular Riemann-Roch Theorem
entry.summary: Equivariant Riemann-Roch theorem for the complex variety under the action of complex linear reductive algebraic group.

entry.title: Vertex algebras and elliptic genera
entry.summary: A report at Arbeitstagung, June 1999, Bonn, on the joint work with V.Gorbounov, F.Malikov and A.Vaintrob.

entry.title: Noncommutative compact manifolds constructed from quivers
entry.summary: The moduli spaces of theta-semistable representations of a finite quiver can be packaged together to form a noncommutative compact manifold.

entry.title: Degeneration of moduli spaces and generalized theta functions
entry.summary: We prove a factorization theorem of generalized functions for moduli spaces of semistable parabolic bundles of any rank.
entry.arxiv:comment: Amstex, 59 pages, to appear in Journal of Algebraic Geometry

entry.title: The Sebastiani-Thom Isomorphism in the Derived Category
entry.summary: We prove a derived category version of the Sebastiani-Thom Theorem, which describes the vanishing cycles of the sum of two functions of disjoint variables.

entry.title: Exponential sums on A^n
entry.summary: We discuss exponential sums on affine space from the point of view of Dwork's p-adic cohomology theory
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages, to appear in Israel J. Math

entry.title: Geometry and Algebra of prime Fano 3-folds of genus 12
entry.summary: The connection between these Fano 3-folds and plane quartic curves is explained.

entry.title: Subalgebras and Discriminants of Anticommutative Algebras
entry.summary: The paper deals with the configuration of subalgebras in generic $n$-dimensional $k$-argument anticommutative algebras and ``regular'' anticommutative algebras.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Izvestiya RAN; Ser. Mat., Vol. 63, pp. 169-184

entry.title: Invariant Linear Connections on Homogeneous Symplectic Varieties
entry.summary: We find all homogeneous symplectic varieties of connected reductive algebraic groups that admit an invariant linear connection.

entry.title: Chow groups of weighted hypersurfaces
entry.summary: We extend a result of to Esnault-Levine-Viehweg concerning the Chow groups of hypersurfaces in projective space to those in weighted projective spaces.

entry.title: Affine surfaces with isomorphic cylinders
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn by the authors.

entry.title: Monodromy of elliptic surfaces
entry.summary: We study monodromy groups of elliptic fibrations over the projective line.

entry.title: Density of integral points on algebraic varieties
entry.summary: We study the distribution of integral points on log varieties.

entry.title: Residual finiteness for complexified real line arrangements
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn due to a crucial error in the proof of the main theorem

entry.title: Relations among divisors on the moduli space of curves with marked points
entry.summary: We prove relations among the classes of certain divisors on the moduli spaces of curves with marked points, generalizing the Brill-Noether Ray Theorem of Eisenbud and Harris.

entry.title: La correspondance de Langlands sur les corps de fonctions [d'aprÃ¨s Laurent Lafforgue]
entry.summary: This is the text of a Bourbaki lecture that I gave on March 12, 2000.

entry.title: On the WDVV-equation in quantum K-theory
entry.summary: A K-theoretic counterpart of quantum cohomology theory is discussed.

entry.title: Multiplier Ideals of Monomial Ideals
entry.summary: In this note we calculate the multiplier ideal associated to an arbitrary monomial ideal in C^n. We discuss applications to the calculation of log canonical thresholds.

entry.title: Factorization of generalized theta functions at reducible case
entry.summary: We proved the factorization of generalized theta functions when the curve has two irreducible components meeting at one node.

entry.title: The Aspinwall-Morrison calculation and Gromov-Witten theory
entry.summary: We prove the Aspinwall-Morrison formula by relating their calculation to Gromov-Witten theory.

entry.title: On one class of unipotent subgroups of semisimple algebraic groups
entry.summary: This paper contains a complete proof of a fundamental theorem on the normalizers of unipotent subgroups in semisimple algebraic groups.

entry.title: Lagrangian subvarieties of abelian fourfolds
entry.summary: We construct examples of algebraic surfaces with interesting fundamental groups.

entry.title: Motivic measures
entry.summary: A survey of work on motivic integration.
entry.arxiv:comment: Seminaire Bourbaki, 52eme annee, mars 2000, no. 874, to appear in Asterisque, 25 p. Some parts revised, especially sections 5 and 7

entry.title: Miyanishi's characterization of the affine 3-space does not hold in higher dimensions
entry.summary: We present an example which confirms the assertion of the title.

entry.title: The Hodge Conjecture for general Prym varieties
entry.summary: The space of Hodge cycles of the general Prym variety is proved to be generated by its Neron-Severi group.

entry.title: Canonical abelianization of finite group actions
entry.summary: In these notes we present a corrected version of the algorithm for abelianization of stabilizers of finite group actions on smooth manifolds using equivariant blow ups.

entry.title: Classification of Elliptic Line Scrolls
entry.summary: The classification of projective elliptic line scrolls with the description of their singular loci is given. In particular we recover Atiyah Theorem by using classical methods.

entry.title: On a Relative Version of Fujita's Freeness Conjecture
entry.summary: We consider Fujita's freeness conjecture in a relative setting and prove a criterion by proving a correct Q-divisor version of the Kollar vanishing theorem.

entry.title: Invariance of plurigenera of varieties with nonngative Kodaira dimensions
entry.summary: We prove the invariance of plurigenera under smooth projective deformations of varieties with nonnegative Kodaira dimensions.

entry.title: Commuting elements in Galois groups of function fields
entry.summary: We study abelian subgroups of Galois groups of function fields.

entry.title: Orbifold Gromov-Witten Theory
entry.summary: In this article, we introduce the notion of good map and use it to establish Gromov-Witten theory for orbifolds.

entry.title: Weak Positivity and Dyson's Lemma
entry.summary: We state and prove a version of Dyson's Lemma for a product of smooth projective varieties of arbitrary dimension using positivity methods.

entry.title: On the Strong Factorization of Toric Birational Maps
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author, due to a counter example to step 6.2 indicated by K. Karu.

entry.title: Effective descent maps for schemes
entry.summary: The paper is withdrawn due to mistakes in the proofs for Proposition 1.2 and Theorem 2.2.

entry.title: Invariants of finite group schemes
entry.summary: We investigate the algebras of invariants and the properties of the quotient morphism by an action of a finite group scheme in terms of stabilizers of points.

entry.title: Reduced power operations in motivic cohomology
entry.summary: In this paper we construct an analog of Steenrod operations in motivic cohomology and prove their basic properties including the Cartan formula, the Adem relations and the realtions to characteristic classes.

entry.title: On algebraic fiber spaces
entry.summary: We construct a cohomological mixed Hodge complex on a fiber of a weakly semistable fibration using logarithmic de Rham complex.

entry.title: Hodge decomposition of Alexander invariants
entry.summary: Multivariable Alexander invariants of algebraic links calculated in terms of algebro-geometric invariants (polytopes and ideals of quasiadjunction). The relations with log-canonical divisors, the multiplier ideals and a semicontinuity property of polytopes of quasiadjunction is discussed.

entry.title: Eigenvalues for the monodromy of the Milnor fibers of arrangements
entry.summary: We decribe upper bounds for the orders of the eigenvalues of the monodromy of Milnor fibers of arrangements given in terms of combinatorics.

entry.title: Swan Conductors and Torsion in the Logarithmic de Rham Complex
entry.summary: Using a recent work of K.Kato and T.Saito we give a logarithmic version of a formula of S.Bloch in ramification theory.

entry.title: On the Chow ring of a K3 surface
entry.summary: Though the Chow group of 0-cycles on a K3 surface is quite large, we observe that the subgroup generated by product of divisors is cyclic.

entry.title: Elementary equivalence versus Isomorphism
entry.summary: How does the first order language of fields encode birational invariants of varieties?... This question is related to rational points on varieties and effectiveness in algebraic/arithmetic geometry.

entry.title: Fujiki relation on symplectic varieties
entry.summary: We generalize Fujiki relation of Beauville-Bogomolov quadratic form on a projective symplectic variety. As an application, we study a fibre space structure of a projective symplectic variety.

entry.title: A p-adic proof of Hodge symmetry for threefolds
entry.summary: In this note we give a p-adic proof of Hodge symmetry for smooth, projective threefolds over complex numbers.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Comptes Rendus Math. Acad. Sci. Paris 338 no. 10, 781--786 2004

entry.title: Gonality and Clifford Index of curves on $K3$ Surfaces
entry.summary: We show that every possible value for the Clifford index and gonality of a curve of a given genus on a $K3$ surface occurs.

entry.title: On equations defining coincident root loci
entry.summary: We study the problem of specifying algebraic conditions on the coefficients of a binary form, so that it may have roots with preassigned multiplicities.

entry.title: Francia's flip and derived categories
entry.summary: We extend some of the results of Bondal-Orlov on the equivalence of derived categories to the case of orbifolds by using the category of coherent orbifold sheaves.

entry.title: A Generalise Harbourne-Hirschowitz Conjecture
entry.summary: A conjecture for higher order separation on generic rational surfaces with some new results about standard divisors.

entry.title: Non-Abelian Class Field Theory for Riemann Surfaces
entry.summary: In this paper, using what we call a micro reciprocity law, we complete Weil's program for non-abelian class field theory of Riemann surfaces.

entry.title: A Program For Geometric Arithmetic
entry.summary: Proposed is a program for what we call Geometric Arithmetic, based on our works on non-abelian zeta functions and non-abelian class field theory. Key words are stability and adelic intersection-cohomology theory.

entry.title: On exceptional terminal singularities
entry.summary: The first examples of exceptional terminal singularities are constructed.

entry.title: Blow-ups of three-dimensional terminal singularities: cA case
entry.summary: Divisors with minimal discrepancy over cA points are classified

entry.title: Divisorial contractions to some Gorenstein singularities
entry.summary: Divisorial contractions to singularities, defined by equations $xy+z^n+u^n=0$ $n\ge3$ and $xy+z^3+u^4=0$ are classified.

entry.title: A Note on Arithmetic Cohomologies for Number Fields
entry.summary: As a part of our program for Geometric Arithmetic, we develop an arithmetic cohomology theory for number fields using theory of locally compact groups.

entry.title: Integration motivique sur les schemas formels
entry.summary: We develop the theory of motivic integration for formal schemes

entry.title: Small Contractions of Symplectic 4-folds
entry.summary: We classify small contractions of (holomorphically) symplectic 4-folds.

entry.title: Dimensions of jet schemes of log singularities
entry.summary: The aim of the paper is to characterize Kawamata log terminal singularities and log canonical singularities by dimensions of jet schemes. It is a generalization of Mustata's result.

entry.title: Fano's inequality is a mistake
entry.summary: An example of a Cremona transformation of the tree-dimensional projective space is presented. For the transformation, the inequalities of Fano are not valid.

entry.title: Fano's inequality is also false for three-dimensional quadric
entry.summary: A birational transformation of three-dimensional quadric is constructed. The inequalities of fano are not fulfilled for this transformation.

entry.title: Vertex Algebroids I
entry.summary: We give a ``coordinate free'' construction and prove the uniqueness of the vertex algebroid which gives rise to the chiral de Rham complex.

entry.title: Simple examples of symplectic fourfolds with exotic properties
entry.summary: We construct examples of simply connected nonalgebraic symplectic fourfolds with a prescribed number of nonintersecting symplectic curves with positive self-intersections.

entry.title: Unramified correspondences
entry.summary: We study correspondences between algebraic curves defined over the separable closure of $\Q$ or $\F_p$.

entry.title: Geometry of reduced sextics of torus type
entry.summary: We give a complete classsification of reduced sextics of torus type with configurations of the singularities and the geometry of the components.

entry.title: On Beilinson's Hodge and Tate conjectures for open complete intersections
entry.summary: The contents is changed.

entry.title: A Note on the Geometry of Green-Lazarsfeld sets
entry.summary: We study some subsets of the Green-Lazarsfeld set $\Sigma^{1}(M)$ for a compact Kahler manifold $M$.

entry.title: Solvable Quotients of Kahler Groups
entry.summary: We prove several results on the structure of solvable quotients of fundamental groups of compact Kahler manifolds (Kahler groups).

entry.title: Alexander polynomial of sextics
entry.summary: Alexander polynomials of sextics with only simple singularities or sextics of torus type with arbitrary singularities are computed. We show that for ieeducible sextics,there are four possibilities: $(t^2-t+1)^j, j=0,1,2,3$.

entry.title: Rationality of moduli of elliptic fibrations with fixed monodromy
entry.summary: We prove rationality results for moduli spaces of elliptic K3 surfaces and elliptic rational surfaces with fixed monodromy groups.

entry.title: Boundedness of log terminal Fano pairs of bounded index
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture of Batryev which states that the family of all Fano varieties with kawamata log terminal singularities and fixed index, forms a bounded family.

entry.title: A divisorial valuation with irrational volume
entry.summary: In this paper we present a divisorial valuation with irrational volume using an algebro-geometric construction.

entry.title: Symplectic Resolutions for Quotient Singularities
entry.summary: We give some necessary conditions for the existence of a symplectic resolution for quotient singularities. The McKay correspondence is also worked out for these resolutions.

entry.title: Classification of exceptional log Del Pezzo surfaces with delta=1
entry.summary: The exceptional log Del Pezzo surfaces with delta=1 are classified.

entry.title: Classification of log Enriques surfaces with delta=1
entry.summary: Log Enriques surfaces with delta=1 are classified.

entry.title: Non Weierstrass Numerical Semigroups of Genus g >= 10
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the authors, due a gap in the proof of the main Theorem.

entry.title: Torelli's theorem for high degree symmetric products of curves
entry.summary: We show that two smooth projective curves C_1 and C_2 of genus g which have isomorphic symmetric products are isomorphic unless g=2. This extends a theorem of Martens.

entry.title: Abelian surfaces with odd bilevel structure
entry.summary: The moduli space of abelian surfaces with polarisation of type (1,t) and a bilevel structure is of general type if t is odd and at least 17.

entry.title: Georg Cantor and his heritage
entry.summary: Talk at the meeting of the German Mathematical Society and the Cantor Medal Award Ceremony

entry.title: Birational models of del Pezzo fibrations
entry.summary: This is a preliminary version of the paper for the Lecture Notes Series.

entry.title: A generalization of Le Potier's vanishing theorem
entry.summary: We prove a new vanishing theorem generalizing that of Le Potier for Schur functors of a vector bundle.

entry.title: The additive dilogarithm
entry.summary: We define an additive version of the Bloch group of a field, together with an additive dilogarithm and an Artin-Schreier realization.

entry.title: A characterization of certain irreducible symplectic 4-folds
entry.summary: We give a characterization of irreducible symplectic fourfolds which are given as Hilbert scheme of points on a K3 surface.
entry.arxiv:comment: 9 pages. To appear in manuscripta mathematica

entry.title: Centrally symmetric generators in toric Fano varieties
entry.summary: We give a structure theorem for n-dimensional smooth toric Fano varieties whose associated polytope has "many" pairs of centrally symmetric vertices.

entry.title: Questions on self maps of algebraic varieties
entry.summary: In this note we discuss some arithmetic and geometric questions concerning self maps of projective algebraic varieties.

entry.title: Integrating $\partial \bar{\partial}$
entry.summary: We consider the algebro-geometric consequences of integration by parts.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Proceedings of the ICM, Beijing 2002, vol. 1, 547--554

entry.title: Termination of 4-fold canonical flips
entry.summary: We prove the termination of 4-fold canonical flips.
entry.arxiv:comment: 5 pages, a revised version of my private note, which was circulated in May 2002

entry.title: Special elliptic fibrations
entry.summary: We construct examples of elliptic fibrations of orbifold general type (in the sense of Campana) which have no etale covers dominating a variety of general type.

entry.title: Elements of Nonstandard Algebraic Geometry
entry.summary: We study varieties defined over nonstandard fields using techniques of nonstandard mathematics.

entry.title: A non-commutative BGG correspondence
entry.summary: A non-commutative version of the Bernstein-Gel'fand-Gel'fand (BGG) correspondence is set up, and a sample application is given to periodic injective resolutions.

entry.title: On Shokurov's Log Flips: The 3-dimensional Case
entry.summary: This is a survey on the recent fundamental paper by V.V. Shokurov on the existence of log flips.

entry.title: Holomorphic forms on threefolds
entry.summary: Two conjectures relating the Kodaira dimension of a smooth projective variety and existence of number of nowhere vanishing 1-forms on the variety are proposed and verified in dimension 3.

entry.title: Sextic surfaces with ten triple points
entry.summary: All families of sextic surfaces with the maximal number of isolated triple points are found.

entry.title: Vertex Algebroids II
entry.summary: In this note we determine the obstruction to triviality of the stack of exact vertex algebroids.

entry.title: Equivariant analogue of Grothendieck's theorem for vector bundles on $\Bbb{P}^1$
entry.summary: We prove an equivariant analogue of Grothendieck's theorem for vector bundles on the one dimensional projective space over complex numbers.

entry.title: Classification of weighted graphs up to blowing-up and blowing-down
entry.summary: We classify weighted forests up to the blowing-up and blowing-down operations which are relevant for the study of algebraic surfaces.

entry.title: A note on group actions on algebraic stacks
entry.summary: We give the basic definitions of group actions on (algebraic) stacks, and prove the existence of fixed points and quotients as (algebraic) stacks.

entry.title: Conics in the Grothendieck ring
entry.summary: This note describes the subring of the Grothendieck ring of k-varieties generated by smooth conics; finding many zero divisors. The proof uses only elementary projective geometry.

entry.title: A splitting criterion for two-dimensional semi-tori
entry.summary: We investigate conditions under which a two-dimensional complex semi-torus splits into a direct product of C^* and a one-dimensional compact complex torus.

entry.title: Higher Stanley-Reisner rings and Toric Residues
entry.summary: We give a purely algebraic proof of the hypersurface case of Toric Residue Mirror Conjecture recently proposed by Batyrev and Materov.

entry.title: A geometric application of Nori's connectivity theorem
entry.summary: We prove among other things that a general Calabi-Yau hypersurface in projective space is not rationally swept out by abelian varieties of dimension greater than or equal to 2.

entry.title: The theory of tight closure from the viewpoint of vector bundles
entry.summary: We present a geometric interpretation of tight closure in terms of vector bundles and projective bundles.

entry.title: A characterization of the Fermat quartic K3 surface by means of finite symmetries
entry.summary: We shall characterize the Fermat K3 surface, among all complex K3 surfaces, by means of its finite group symmetries.

entry.title: The moduli b-divisor of an lc-trivial fibration
entry.summary: We study positivity properties of the moduli (b-)divisor associated to a relative log pair $(X,B)/Y$ with relatively trivial log canonical class.

entry.title: Universal torsors and Cox rings
entry.summary: We study the equations of universal torsors on rational surfaces.

entry.title: Varieties with $P_3(X)=4$ and $q(X)=\dim (X)$
entry.summary: We classify varieties with $P_3(X)=4$ and $q(X)=\dim (X)$.

entry.title: On the quantum cohomology of homogeneous varieties
entry.summary: This is an expository lecture, for the Abel bicentennial (Oslo, 2002), describing some recent work on the (small) quantum cohomology ring of Grassmannians and other homogeneous varieties.

entry.title: Supersingular K3 surfaces in odd characteristic and sextic double planes
entry.summary: We show that every supersingular K3 surface is birational to a double cover of a projective plane.

entry.title: ThÃ©orie des dÃ©formations Ã©quivariantes des morphismes localement d'intersection complÃ¨te
entry.summary: This is an expository paper on the subject of the title. It assumes basic scheme theory, commutative and homological algebra.

entry.title: Rational curves and points on K3 surfaces
entry.summary: We study the distribution of algebraic points on K3 surfaces.

entry.title: Drinfel'd-Ihara Relations for the Crystalline Frobenius
entry.summary: We give a proof that the p-adic multi-zeta values satisfy the Drinfel'd-Ihara relations.

entry.title: Fano threefolds with sections in $Î©_V^1(1)$
entry.summary: We study Fano threefolds with Picard number one equipped with a holomorphic section in $\Omega_V^1(1)$.

entry.title: Nef reduction and anticanonical bundles
entry.summary: We investigate the structure of smooth projective 3-folds X with -K_X nef and K_X^3=0.

entry.title: Log Crepant Birational Maps and Derived Categories
entry.summary: We extend the conjecture on the derived equivalence and K-equivalence to the logarithmic case and prove it in the toric case.

entry.title: Calabi--Yau threefolds with infinitely many divisorial contractions
entry.summary: We study Calabi--Yau 3-folds with infinitely many divisorial contractions. We also suggest a method to describe Calabi--Yau 3-folds with the infinite automorphism group.

entry.title: Invariant multidimensional matrices
entry.summary: A rank $n$ Steiner bundle on $\P^n$ which is $SL(2,\C)$ invariant is a Schwarzenberger bundle
entry.arxiv:comment: preuve simplifiee d'un resultat d'Ancona et Ottaviani

entry.title: The unirationality of the moduli space of curves of genus $\leq 14$
entry.summary: The new result is the unirationality of the moduli space of curves of genus 14. The method applies to lower genus.

entry.title: On homaloidal polynomials
entry.summary: We classify homogeneous polynomials which split as powers of linear forms and whose polar map is birational.

entry.title: The Severi problem for Hirzebruch surfaces
entry.summary: We prove that the locus of irreducible nodal curves on a given Hirzebruch surface F_k of given linear equivalency class and genus g is irreducible.

entry.title: On the ring of invariants of ordinary quartic curves in characteristic 2
entry.summary: In this article a complete set of invariants for ordinary quartic curves in characteristic 2 is computed.

entry.title: On a Lemma of Bompiani
entry.summary: We reprove in modern terms and extend to arbitrary dimension a classical result of Enrico Bompiani on algebraic surfaces $X \subset \PP^r$ having very degenerate osculating spaces.

entry.title: Variation on Artin's vanishing theorem
entry.summary: We give a proof of Artin's vanishing theorem in characteristic zero, based on Deligne's Riemann-Hilbert correspondence. Just as a curiosity.

entry.title: Positivity in equivariant quantum Schubert Calculus
entry.summary: We prove a positivity result in (T-)equivariant quantum cohomology of the homogeneous space G/P, generalizing Graham's positivity in equivariant cohomology.

entry.title: Degenerations of Del Pezzo surfaces and the Gromov-Witten invariants of the Hilbert Scheme of conics
entry.summary: We investigate the characteristic numbers of Del Pezzo surfaces using degenerations.

entry.title: Luigi Cremona and cubic surfaces
entry.summary: We discuss Luigi Cremona's contribution to the early development of the theory of cubic surfaces.

entry.title: A correction to: Rational and nearly rational varieties
entry.summary: We correct a misattribution in our book.

entry.title: Faltings' delta-invariant of a hyperelliptic Riemann surface
entry.summary: In this note we give a closed formula for Faltings' delta-invariant of a hyperelliptic Riemann surface.

entry.title: Courbes elliptiques sur la variete spinorielle de dimension 10
entry.summary: In this article we answer a question of D. Markushevich and prove the irreducibility of the scheme of morphisms from an elliptic curve to the spinor tenfold.

entry.title: Le calcul de Schubert selon Schubert
entry.summary: We try to understand Schubert calculus the way he did it

entry.title: Cones and Asymptotic Invariants of Multigraded Systems of Ideals
entry.summary: We define cone structures and asymptotic invariants for multigraded systems of ideals, and show that essentially the only restrictions on such structures is convexity, which is imposed formally.

entry.title: Notes on abelian class field theory
entry.summary: We give a presentation of abelian class field theory.
entry.arxiv:comment: We amplify the last remark a little

entry.title: On singular varieties having an extremal secant line
entry.summary: We correct a mistake in an earlier paper and give a complete classification of singular varieties having an extremal secant line.

entry.title: Birationally rigid Fano cyclic covers
entry.summary: We prove birational superrigidity of Fano cyclic covers of index 1 over hypersurfaces in the projective space.

entry.title: Weak approximation over function fields
entry.summary: We prove that rationally connected varieties over the function field of a complex curve satisfy weak approximation for places of good reduction.

entry.title: UVW relations over a subvariety of a hyperelliptic Jacobian
entry.summary: This article extends relations of Mumford's UVW-expressions to those in subvarieties in a hyperelliptic Jacobian using Baker's method.

entry.title: A semiampleness criterion
entry.summary: We give a criterion for a real divisor to be rational and semiample.

entry.title: The arithmetic and the geometry of Kobayashi hyperbolicity
entry.summary: We survey the properties of Brody and Kobayashi hyperbolic manifolds.
entry.arxiv:comment: 12 pages, 2 figures, report for Algebraic Geometry: Presentations by Young Researchers

entry.title: Kato-Nakayama's comparison theorem and analytic log etale topoi
entry.summary: In this paper we study topics related to one of Kato-Nakayama's comparison theorems using analytic log etale topoi.

entry.title: A smooth, complete threefold with no nontrivial nef line bundles
entry.summary: We present a smooth, complete toric threefold with no nontrivial nef line bundles. This is a counterexample to a recent conjecture of Fujino.

entry.title: Opers
entry.summary: This article is an elementary introduction to opers without new results. We hope it can be useful for students.

entry.title: $\Cal M_{15}$ is rationally connected
entry.summary: The authors prove that $\Cal M_{15}$ is rationally connected
entry.arxiv:comment: to appear in "Projective varieties with unexpected properties. A volume in memory of Giuseppe Veronese"

entry.title: Selected problems
entry.summary: This is a renovated list of open problems, to appear in: "Affine Algebraic Geometry" conference Proceedings volume in Contemporary Mathematics series of the Amer. Math. Soc. Ed. by Jaime Gutierrez, Vladimir Shpilrain, and Jie-Tai Yu.

entry.title: Type II Unprojection
entry.summary: Answering a question of M. Reid, we define and prove the Gorensteiness of the type II unprojection.

entry.title: Explicit sections on Kuwata's elliptic surfaces
entry.summary: We give explicit generators for subgroups of finite index of the Mordell-Weil groups of several families of elliptic surfaces introduced by Masato Kuwata.

entry.title: Classification of all Jacobian elliptic fibrations on certain K3 surfaces
entry.summary: In this paper we classify all configurations of singular fibers of elliptic fibrations on the double cover of P^2 ramified along six lines in general position.

entry.title: Classes de Chern des variÃ©tÃ©s unirÃ©glÃ©es
entry.summary: We prove a Miyaoka-Yau type inequality for uniruled projective varieties.

entry.title: Intersection theory of toroidal compactifications of A_4
entry.summary: We determine the intersection theory on the Igusa compactification and the second Voronoi compactification of A_4.

entry.title: Derived equivalence for stratified Mukai flop on G(2,4)
entry.summary: We prove that there is a derived equivalence for stratified Mukai flop on G(2,4).

entry.title: Derived Categories of Toric Varieties
entry.summary: We prove that the derived categories for toric varieties have complete exceptional collections.

entry.title: Toric Rigid Spaces
entry.summary: This paper gives a method to construct rigid spaces, which is similar to the method used to construct toric schemes.

entry.title: Gieseker-Petri special curves
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn by change of content and some errors in the examples.

entry.title: Clifford Theorem for real algebraic curves
entry.summary: We establish for smooth projective real curves the equivalent of the classical Clifford inequality known for complex curves. We also study the cases when equality holds.

entry.title: The group of automorphisms of semigroup of endomorphisms of free commutative and free associative algebras
entry.summary: In this paper are described the groups of automorphisms of semigroup End(W(X)), where W(X) is free commutative or free associative algebra.

entry.title: On the Hodge Filtration of Hodge Modules
entry.summary: We give explicit formulas for the Hodge filtration on mixed Hodge modules associated with certain hypersurfaces.

entry.title: The Galois closure of the Garcia-Stichtenoth tower
entry.summary: We describe the Galois closure of the Garcia-Stichtenoth tower and prove that it is optimal.

entry.title: The Cohomology of Reflexive Sheaves on Smooth Projective 3-folds
entry.summary: We study the cohomology of reflexive rank 2 sheaves on smooth projective threefolds. Applications are given to the moduli space of reflexive sheaves.

entry.title: Note on tautological classes of moduli of K3 surfaces
entry.summary: We prove some cycle relations on moduli of K3 surfaces

entry.title: Young diagrams and embeddings of Grassmannians
entry.summary: We consider two embeddings between Grassmannians and study the associated morphisms between the corresponding Chow rings.

entry.title: Zariski pairs on sextics I
entry.summary: We show the existence of sextics of non-torus type which is a Zariski partner of the tame sextics of torus type with simple singularities.

entry.title: Surfaces with DIF$\ne$DEF real structures
entry.summary: We study real Campedelli surfaces up to real deformations and exhibit a number of such surfaces which are equivariantly diffeomorphic but not real deformation equivalent.

entry.title: Conformal blocks revisited
entry.summary: We give a simple coordinate free description of the WZW connection and derive its main properties.

entry.title: On the existence of flips
entry.summary: We prove the existence of flips in dimension n, contingent on the termination of real flips in dimension n-1.

entry.title: A pamphlet on motivic cohomology
entry.summary: This short note is an "elementary'' introduction to the conjectural theory of motives.
entry.arxiv:comment: 19 pages, to appear on Milan Journal of Math

entry.title: Hilbert schemes of points via McKay correspondences
entry.summary: The results of this paper were already known.

entry.title: Localization in quiver moduli
entry.summary: The fixed point set under a natural torus action on projectivized moduli spaces of simple representations of quivers is described. As an application, the Euler characteristic of these moduli is computed.

entry.title: Brauer groups and crepant resolutions
entry.summary: We suggest a twisted version of the categorical McKay correspondence and prove several results related to it.

entry.title: DÃ©formations des courbes rationnelles
entry.summary: A counter example to the main result has been communicated to the author by Matei Toma.

entry.title: Classification of Fano manifolds containing a negative divisor isomorphic to projective space
entry.summary: We classify Fano manifolds X containing a divisor E isomorphic to projective space such that the normal bundle $N_{E/X}$ is strictly negative.

entry.title: Classification problems and mirror duality
entry.summary: We propose a general approach to classification problems in algebraic geometry via mirror duality. For Fano threefolds, a modularity conjecture describes small quantum cohomology and predicts the values of certain Gromov-Witten invariants.

entry.title: A survey on symplectic singularities and resolutions
entry.summary: This is a survey written in an expositional style on the topic of symplectic singularities and symplectic resolutions, which could also serve as an introduction to this subject.

entry.title: Canonical heights for random iterations in certain varieties
entry.summary: We show the existence of canonical heights of subvarieties for bounded sequences of morphisms and give some applications.

entry.title: Inversion of adjunction on log canonicity
entry.summary: We prove inversion of adjunction on log canonicity.
entry.arxiv:comment: 4 pages; minor typos in the proof of Lemma 3 corrected

entry.title: Factorial hypersurfaces in P^4 with nodes
entry.summary: We prove that for n= 5, 6, 7, a nodal hypersurface of degree n in P^4 is factorial if it has at most (n-1)^2-1 nodes.

entry.title: Comment on a Paper by Kuo, Parusinski and Paunescu On Jacobian Conjecture
entry.summary: The said paper entitled "A Proof Of The Plane Jacobian Conjecture" is not true.

entry.title: Terminal Fano threefolds and their smoothings
entry.summary: We study smoothings of Fano threefolds. We prove that the Picard number remains constant in the case of terminal Gorenstein singularities.

entry.title: Algebraic monoids with affine unit group are affine
entry.summary: In this short note we prove that any irreducible algebraic monoid whose unit group is an affine algebraic group is affine.

entry.title: On nodal quintic fourfold
entry.summary: We use the Shokurov connectedness principle and the Corti inequality to prove the birational superrigidity of a nodal hypersurface in $\mathbb{P}^{5}$ of degree 5.

entry.title: The maximal free rational quotient
entry.summary: This short, expository note proves the existence of the maximal quotient of a variety by free rational curves.

entry.title: A Chevalley formula in equivariant $K$-theory
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to give a recursive formula to multiply a line bundle with the structure sheaf of a schubert variety in the equivariant $K$-theory of a flag variety.

entry.title: Nash problem for stable toric varieties
entry.summary: We present a solution for Nash problem for stable toric varieties. We also introduce Nash problem for pairs and prove it for toric pairs.

entry.title: Derived category and Lie algebras
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author(s), due the final version in math.QA/0604564

entry.title: Fourier-Mukai transform on abelian surfaces
entry.summary: We show that the Fourier-Mukai transfortm on an abelian surface induces a birational map of the moduli space of stablke sheaves.

entry.title: Algebraic Geometry over Lie Algebras
entry.summary: This is a survey paper on Alegbraic Geometry over Lie Algebras

entry.title: PainlevÃ© equations and the middle convolution
entry.summary: We use the middle convolution to obtain some old and new algebraic solutions of the Painlev\'e VI equations.

entry.title: On abelian families and holomorphic normal projective connections
entry.summary: We prove Chern class equalities for abelian families with a holomorphic normal projective connection.

entry.title: The Kempf-Ness theorem and Invariant Theory
entry.summary: We give new proofs of some well-known results from Invariant Theorey using the Kempf-Ness theorem.

entry.title: On the Beauville form of the known irreducible symplectic varieties
entry.summary: We study the global geometry of the ten dimensional O'Grady irreducible symplectic variety. We determine its second Betti number, its Beauville form and its Fujiki constant.

entry.title: On normal K3 surfaces
entry.summary: We determine all possible configurations of rational double points on complex normal algebraic K3 surfaces, and on normal supersingular K3 surfaces in characteristic p > 19.

entry.title: On Severi varieties on Hirzebruch surfaces
entry.summary: In the current paper we prove that any Severi variety on a Hirzebruch surface contains a unique component parameterizing irreducible nodal curves of the given genus in characteristic zero.

entry.title: Three-dimensional toric morphisms with anti-nef canonical divisors
entry.summary: In this paper, we classify projective toric birational morphisms from Gorenstein toric 3-folds onto the 3-dimensional affine space with relatively ample anti-canonical divisors.

entry.title: Towards a general theory of unprojection
entry.summary: We propose a general definition of unprojection, and prove that it indeed generalizes previous efforts.

entry.title: The global Torelli theorem: classical, derived, twisted
entry.summary: Survey written for the Proceedings of the AMS Meeting on Algebraic Geometry, Seattle, 2005. Based on the talk delivered at this occasion, but a few comments on recent developments are added.

entry.title: The irreducibility of the spaces of rational curves on del Pezzo surfaces
entry.summary: We prove that the spaces of rational curves on del Pezzo surfaces are either irreducible or empty, with a unique exception.

entry.title: Torelli's theorem from the topological point of view
entry.summary: Torelli's theorem is proven by the study of the convolution product of the intersection cohomology sheaf of the thetadivisor.

entry.title: Finite Dimensional Representations of the Projective Modular Group
entry.summary: We study finite dimensional representations of the projective modular group. Various explicit dimension formulas are given.

entry.title: Computing Fano 3-folds of index >=3
entry.summary: We use the computer algebra system Magma to study graded rings of Fano 3-folds of index >=3 in terms of their Hilbert series.

entry.title: Singularities of dual varieties in characteristic 2
entry.summary: We investigate unibranched singularities of dual varieties of even-dimensional smooth projective varieties in characteristic 2.

entry.title: Basic properties of log canonical centers
entry.summary: We present the elementary properties of log canonical centers of log varieties.

entry.title: Mirror Principle For Flag Manifolds
entry.summary: We obtain A- and B- series of flag manifolds for T-equivariant tangent bundles and equivariant Chern polynomial following the arguments of Lian, Liu, Yau.

entry.title: Wreath products, nilpotent orbits and symplectic deformations
entry.summary: We recover a 4-dimensional wreath product X as a transversal slice to a nilpotent orbit in sp_6. By using deformations of Springer resolutions, we construct a symplectic deformation of symplectic resolutions of X.

entry.title: On the formalisme of mixed sheaves
entry.summary: We give a formalism of mixed sheaves on varieties over a subfield of the complex number field.
entry.arxiv:comment: 54 pages, converted from Preprint RIMS-784, Aug. 1991

entry.title: Almost del Pezzo manifolds
entry.summary: We classify almost del Pezzo manifolds in arbitrary dimension n, i.e., projective manifolds X with big and nef anticanonical bundle -K_X, such that -K_X is divisible by n-1.

entry.title: Effectivity of Brauer-Manin obstructions
entry.summary: We study Brauer-Manin obstructions to the Hasse principle and to weak approximation with special regard to effectivity questions.

entry.title: An inductive approach to the Hodge conjecture for abelian varieties
entry.summary: We describe an inductive approach most appropriate for abelian varieties with an action of an imaginary quadratic field.

entry.title: Topologies on a triangulated category
entry.summary: On objects of a triangulated category with a stability condition, we construct a topology.

entry.title: Numerical obstructions to abelian surfaces in toric Fano 4-fold
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn because it is superseded by arXiv:0710.4284

entry.title: Trees, valuations and the Green-Lazrsfeld set
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is the study of the relationship between two objects, the Green-Lazarsfeld set and the Bieri Neumann Strebel invariant.

entry.title: Extended Hilbert's Nullstellensatz
entry.summary: We prove the extended Hilbert's Nullstellensatz in the context of Hu-Liu polynomial trirings.

entry.title: Log canonical thresholds of del Pezzo surfaces
entry.summary: We study global log canonical thresholds of del Pezzo surfaces.

entry.title: Algebraization of complex analytic varieties and derived categories
entry.summary: We prove that a compact complex analytic variety is algebraizable if and only if its bounded derived dg-category of coherent sheaves is saturated.

entry.title: A connectedness theorem for products of weighted projective spaces
entry.summary: We prove a connectedness result for products of weighted projective spaces.

entry.title: Tannakian Categories attached to abelian Varieties
entry.summary: Starting from certain perverse sheaves on an abelian variety, including the intersection cohomology sheaves of curves and smooth ample divisors, we construct a semisimple super-Tannakian category.

entry.title: The Picard group of $M_{1,1}$
entry.summary: We compute the Picard group of the moduli stack of elliptic curves and its canonical compactification over general base schemes.

entry.title: Demazure embeddings are smooth
entry.summary: We prove Brion's conjecture stating that the closure of the orbit of a self-normalizing spherical subalgebra in the corresponding Grassmanian is smooth

entry.title: Remark on the Garnier system in two variables
entry.summary: We remark on the Garnier system in two variables.

entry.title: Inductive characterizations of hyperquadrics
entry.summary: We give two characterizations of hyperquadrics: one as non-degenerate smooth projective varieties swept out by large dimensional quadric subvarieties passing through a point; the other as $LQEL$-manifolds with large secant defects.

entry.title: Integral Chow rings of toric stacks
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to prove that integral Chow rings of toric stacks are naturally isomorphic to Stanley-Reisner rings.

entry.title: The Automorphism Group of Toric Deligne-Mumford Stacks
entry.summary: We prove that the automorphism group of a toric Deligne-Mumford stack is isomorphic to the $2$-group associated to the stacky fan.

entry.title: Enumeration of curves via floor diagrams
entry.summary: In this note we compute some enumerative invariants of real and complex projective spaces by means of some enriched graphs called floor diagrams.

entry.title: Calculation of local Fourier transforms for formal connections
entry.summary: We calculate the local Fourier transforms for formal connections. In particular, we verify an analogous conjecture suggested in Laumon's paper: "Transformation de Fourier, constantes d'equations fonctionnelles et conjecture de Weil, 2.6.3".

entry.title: Canonical volume forms on compact KÃ¤hler manifolds
entry.summary: We construct a canonical singular hermitian metric with semipositive curvature current on the canonical line bundle of a compact K\"{a}hler manifold with pseudoeffective canonical bundle.

entry.title: A computation of invariants of a rational self-map
entry.summary: I compute the dynamical degrees in C. Voisin's example of a rational self-map of the variety of lines on a cubic fourfold.

entry.title: Clifford's theorem for coherent systems
entry.summary: Final version to appear in Archiv der Mathematik.

entry.title: The Analytic Classification of Plane Branches
entry.summary: In this paper we give a solution to Zariski's problem of analytic classification of plane branches.

entry.title: Analytic classification of plane branches up to multiplicity 4
entry.summary: We perform the analytic classification of plane branches of multiplicity less or equal than four.

entry.title: Integrality of instanton numbers
entry.summary: We prove the results announced in a joint paper (arXiv:hep-th/0603106) with Maxim Kontsevich and Albert Schwarz.

entry.title: A canonical Frobenius structure
entry.summary: We show that it makes sense to speak of THE Frobenius manifold attached to a convenient and nondegenerate Laurent polynomial

entry.title: A characterization of the rational normal curve
entry.summary: We give a characterization of the rational normal curve in terms of the rank function associated to a curve.

entry.title: Brauer-Manin obstructions to integral points
entry.summary: We study Brauer-Manin obstructions to integral points on open subsets of the projective plane.

entry.title: Koszul duality for Operads
entry.summary: This is a copy of the article by the same authors published in Duke Math. J. (1994).

entry.title: A Rationality Problem of Some Cremona Transformation
entry.summary: We will show the rationality of the function field of two variables under certain Cremona transformation.

entry.title: Twisted Symmetric Group Actions
entry.summary: We will show the raitonality of some twisted symmetric group actions.

entry.title: Ãtale cohomology of the complement of a linear subspace arrangement
entry.summary: We prove a formula for the cup product on the l-adic cohomology of the complement of a linear subspace arrangement.

entry.title: HyperbolicitÃ© des variÃ©tÃ©s complexes
entry.summary: These notes were written for the Cours Peccot given at the Coll\`ege de France in 2007.

entry.title: Studies on the Lorenz model
entry.summary: We study the Lorenz model from the viewpoint of its accessible singularities and local index.

entry.title: On computations of Hurwitz-Hodge integrals
entry.summary: We describe a method to compute Hurwitz-Hodge integrals.

entry.title: A Note on the a-numbers and p-ranks of Kummer Covers
entry.summary: We study the a-numbers and p-ranks of Kummer covers of the projective line, and we give bounds for these numbers.

entry.title: A note on congruences for theta divisors
entry.summary: The classes of two theta divisors on an abelian variety in the naive Grothendieck ring of varieties need not be congruent modulo the class of the affine line.

entry.title: Compactified Jacobians, Abel maps and Theta divisors
entry.summary: This is an expository paper about the topics listed in the title.

entry.title: Automorphisms of order three on numerical Godeaux surfaces
entry.summary: We prove that a numerical Godeaux surface cannot have an automorphism of order three.

entry.title: Motivic L-Functions
entry.summary: This is the text of an introductory lecture delivered at the IHES summer school on motives in July, 2006.

entry.title: Algebraic differential characters of flat connections with nilpotent residues
entry.summary: We construct unramified algebraic differential characters for flat connections with nilpotent residues along a strict normal crossings divisor.

entry.title: A new family of maximal curves over a finite field
entry.summary: A new family of maximal curves over a finite field is presented and some of their properties are investigated.

entry.title: An effective and sharp lower bound on Seshadri constants on surfaces with Picard number 1
entry.summary: We study lower bounds on Seshadri constants at arbitrary points on surfaces with Picard number 1.
entry.arxiv:comment: 8 pages, to appear in J. Algebra

entry.title: Positivity in the cohomology of flag bundles (after Graham)
entry.summary: We give a short, geometric proof of Graham's theorem on positivity in the equivariant cohomology of a flag variety, based on a transversality argument.

entry.title: The fundamental group of period domains over finite fields
entry.summary: We determine the fundamental group of period domains over finite fields.

entry.title: Birational geometry of Fano double covers
entry.summary: We prove divisorial canonicity of Fano double hypersurfaces of general position.

entry.title: Local Lipschitz geometry of weighted homogeneous surfaces
entry.summary: We compute Hoelder Complexes,i.e. the complete bi-Lipschitz invariants, for germs of real weighed homogeneous algebraic or semialgebraic surfaces.

entry.title: Brill-Noether Theory for stable vector bundles
entry.summary: This paper gives an overview of the main results of Brill-Noether Theory for vector bundles on algebraic curves.

entry.title: On noetherianity for logical formulas over fields
entry.summary: In this paper we consider noetherianity for formulas of propositional and predicate calculus over different fields. Three types of noetherianity are considered: standard noetherianity, logical noetherianity and denumerable noetherianity.

entry.title: The pseudo-index of horospherical Fano varieties
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture of L.Bonavero, C. Casagrande, O. Debarre and S. Druel, on the pseudo-index of smooth Fano varieties, in the special case of horospherical varieties.

entry.title: An arithmetic Riemann-Roch theorem in higher degrees
entry.summary: We prove an analogue in Arakelov geometry of the Grothendieck-Riemann-Roch theorem.

entry.title: Joyce invariants for K3 surfaces and mock theta functions
entry.summary: We will discuss Joyce invariants of stability conditions for K3 surfaces and mock theta functions.

entry.title: A Torelli theorem for curves over finite fields
entry.summary: We study hyperbolic curves and their Jacobians over finite fields in the context of anabelian geometry.

entry.title: Examples of Calabi-Yau 3-manifolds with complex multiplication
entry.summary: We give some concrete examples of Calabi-Yau 3-manifolds with complex multiplication.

entry.title: Maximal contact and normal crossings in resolution of singularities
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been withdrawn by the author

entry.title: K-stability of constant scalar curvature KÃ¤hler manifolds
entry.summary: We show that a polarised manifold with a constant scalar curvature K\"ahler metric and discrete automorphisms is K-stable. This refines the K-semistability proved by S. K. Donaldson.

entry.title: Linear projections and successive minima
entry.summary: Using linear projections one gets new inequalities for the successive minima of the lattice of sections of an hermitian line bundle on an arithmetic surface.

entry.title: An Artin-Rees Theorem and applications to zero cycles
entry.summary: We prove an Artin-Rees type theorem for algebraic cycles and give an application to zero cycles.

entry.title: Derived Categories and Birational Geometry
entry.summary: A survey article for AMS Summer Institute at Seattle in 2005.

entry.title: On termination of log flips in dimension four
entry.summary: We prove the termination of 4-fold log flips for klt pairs of Kodaira dimension $\kappa\ge 2$.

entry.title: S_3-covers of schemes
entry.summary: We analyze flat S_3-covers, attempting to create structures parallel to those found in the abelian theory. We use an initial local analysis as a guide in finding a global description.

entry.title: Descendent bounds for effective divisors on the moduli space of curves
entry.summary: The slope of the moduli space of genus g curves is bounded from below by 60/(g+4) via a descendent calculation.

entry.title: Homogeneous Polynomials with Isomorphic Milnor Algebras
entry.summary: In Theorem 3.2 we show that two homogeneous polynomials $f$ and $g$ having isomorphic Milnor algebras are right-equivalent.

entry.title: On Fano threefolds with canonical Gorenstein singularities
entry.summary: We classify three-dimensional Fano varieties with canonical Gorenstein singularities of degree bigger than 64.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Russ. Acad. Sci. Sb. Math. 2009. V. 200(8). P. 111-146

entry.title: The maximal number of singular points on log del Pezzo surfaces
entry.summary: We prove that a del Pezzo surface with Picard number one has at most four singular points.

entry.title: Iitaka conjecture $C_{n,m}$ in dimension six
entry.summary: We prove that the Iitaka conjecture $C_{n,m}$ for algebraic fibre spaces holds up to dimension 6, that is, when $n\le 6$.

entry.title: Singular Points of Reducible Sextic Curves
entry.summary: There are 106 individual types of singular points for reducible complex sextic curves.

entry.title: The Chow group of zero-cycles on certain Ch{Ã¢}telet surfaces over local fields
entry.summary: We compute the Chow group of zero-cycles on certain Ch{\^a}telet surfaces over local fields.

entry.title: Brill-Noether theory of binary curves
entry.summary: Final version, to appear in Mathematical Research Letters.

entry.title: Birational geometry of singular Fano varieties
entry.summary: We prove divisorial canonicity of Fano hypersurfaces and double spaces of general position with elementary singularities.

entry.title: Existence of minimal models for varieties of log general type II
entry.summary: We prove the existence of pl-flips.

entry.title: Nakajima's remark on Henn's proof
entry.summary: We fill up a gap in Henn's proof concerning large automorphism groups of function fields of degree 1 over an algebraically closed field of positive characteristic.

entry.title: Birational rigidity of Fano varieties and field extensions
entry.summary: The aim of this note is to settle some foundational questions about the behavior of birational rigidity in extensions of algebraically closed fields.

entry.title: Algebraic structures on the topology of moduli spaces of curves and maps
entry.summary: We discuss selected topics on the topology of moduli spaces of curves and maps, emphasizing their relation with Gromov--Witten theory and integrable systems.

entry.title: Wahl's conjecture for a minuscule G/P
entry.summary: We show that Wahl's conjecture holds in all characteristics for a minuscule G/P.

entry.title: Foliations with degenerate Gauss maps on $\mathbb P^4$
entry.summary: We obtain a classification of codimension one holomorphic foliations on $\mathbb P^4$ with degenerate Gauss maps.

entry.title: SU(r,L) is separably unirational
entry.summary: We show that the moduli space of SU_X(r,L) of rank r bundles of fixed determinant L on a smooth projective curve X is separably unirational.

entry.title: Arithmetic Fujita approximation
entry.summary: We prove an arithmetic analogue of Fujita's approximation theorem in Arakelov geometry, conjectured by Moriwaki, by using slope method and measures associated to $\mathbb R$-filtrations.

entry.title: A note on the Poincar'e series of the invariants of ternary forms
entry.summary: Analogue of Springer's formula for the Poincar\'e series of the algebra invariants of ternary form is found.

entry.title: The irreducible components of Hilb^{4n}(P^3)
entry.summary: It is shown that Hilb^{4n}(P^3)has exactly two irreducible components.

entry.title: Unramified cohomology of finite groups of Lie type
entry.summary: We prove vanishing results for unramified stable cohomology of finite groups of Lie type.

entry.title: Computing p-adic integrals using motivic integration
entry.summary: We use the theory of motivic integration in order to give a geometric explanation of the behavior of some p-adic integrals.

entry.title: Towards finite generation of the canonical ring without the MMP
entry.summary: This paper is the first of two steps in a project to prove finite generation of the log canonical ring without Mori theory.

entry.title: Semi log resolution
entry.summary: The aim of this note is to discuss resolution theorems that are useful in the study of semi log canonical varieties.

entry.title: Arithmetic McKay correspondence
entry.summary: We propose an arithmetic McKay correspondence which relates suitably defined zeta functions of some Deligne-Mumford stacks to the zeta functions of their crepant resolutions. Some examples are discussed.

entry.title: Fano Varieties with Large Degree Endomorphisms
entry.summary: We give examples of Fano varieties $X$ with Picard number 1, which have terminal singularities and admit endomorphisms with degree larger than 1.

entry.title: Finiteness of the number of compatibly-split subvarieties
entry.summary: We show that for a Frobenius split variety, there are only finitely many closed subvarieties which are compatibly-split.

entry.title: Introduction to staggered sheaves
entry.summary: This note is an expository account of the theory of staggered sheaves, based on a series of lectures given by the author at RIMS (Kyoto) in October 2008.

entry.title: Co-fibered products of algebraic curves
entry.summary: We give examples of failure of the existence of co-fibered products in the category of algebraic curves.

entry.title: Kruskal's theorem
entry.summary: This is just a short proof of Kruskal's theorem regarding uniqueness of expressions for tensors, phrased in geometric language.

entry.title: The art of finding Calabi-Yau differential eq1uations
entry.summary: Various methods to find Calabi-Yau differential equations are discussed.

entry.title: Subcanonical coordinate rings are Gorenstein
entry.summary: Using a classical result of Avramov-Golod we strengthen a recent result of Gorodentsev, Khoroshkin and Rudakov on syzygies of highest weight orbit closure.

entry.title: Neutral Linear Series
