entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn because the proof of part (b) of the main theorem is incomplete.

entry.title: Automorphisms of parabolic Inoue surfaces
entry.summary: We determine explicitly the structure of the automorphism group of a parabolic Inoue surface. We also describe the quotients of the surface by typical cyclic subgroups of the automorphism group.

entry.title: Linear Shafarevich Conjecture
entry.summary: We prove that the universal covering space of a complex projective manifold is holomorphically convex provided its fundamental group is linear.

entry.title: The canonical strip phenomenon for complete intersections in homogeneous spaces
entry.summary: We show that a refined version of Golyshev's canonical strip hypothesis does hold for the Hilbert polynomials of complete intersections in rational homogeneous spaces.

entry.title: Irreducibility criterion for quasi-ordinary polynomials
entry.summary: We give a criterion for a quasi-ordinary polynomial to be irreducible. The criterion is based on the notion of approximate roots and that of generalized Newton polygons.

entry.title: The Sarkisov program
entry.summary: Any two birational Mori fibre spaces are connected by a sequence of Sarkisov links.

entry.title: Real divergence-free Jacobian maps are shear maps
entry.summary: We show that divergence-free jacobian maps, recently considered in \cite{N}, \cite{S}, are actually shear maps.

entry.title: Rigidity of Mori cone for Fano manifolds
entry.summary: Mori cone is rigid in smooth connected families of Fano manifolds.
entry.arxiv:comment: Short note, to appear in Bull. London Math. Soc

entry.title: On Jacobian conjecture
entry.summary: withdrawed due to a substantial error.

entry.title: Mixed multiplier ideals and the irregularity of abelian coverings of the projective plane
entry.summary: A formula for the irregularity of abelian coverings of the projective plane is established and some applications are presented.

entry.title: Platitude gÃ©omÃ©trique et classes fondamentales relatives pondÃ©rÃ©es II
entry.summary: This second part is devoted to the proof of all main results that we have mentionned in [KI].

entry.title: Riemann-Roch For Equivariant K-Theory
entry.summary: The goal of this paper is to prove the Riemann-Roch isomorphism for the higher equivariant K-theory of varieties with action of a linear algebraic group.

entry.title: On some open problems on maximal curves
entry.summary: In this paper we solve three open problems on maximal curves with Frobenius dimension 3. In particular, we prove the existence of a maximal curve with order sequence (0,1,3,q).

entry.title: Differentially 4-uniform functions
entry.summary: We give a geometric characterization of vectorial boolean functions with differential uniformity less or equal to 4.

entry.title: Classical Zariski pairs
entry.summary: We compute the fundamental groups of all irreducible plane sextics constituting classical Zariski pairs

entry.title: On the derived category of the Cayley plane
entry.summary: We describe a maximal exceptional collection on the Cayley plane, the minimal homogeneous projective variety of $E_6$. This collection consists in a sequence of 27 irreducible homogeneous bundles.

entry.title: Two local inequalities
entry.summary: We prove two local inequalities for divisors on surfaces and study their applications.

entry.title: Geometric Auslander criterion for flatness
entry.summary: Paper withdrawn due to error.

entry.title: Equivalences and stratified flops
entry.summary: We construct natural equivalences between derived categories of coherent sheaves on the local models for stratified Mukai or Atiyah flops (of type A).

entry.title: Stability of tautological vector bundles on Hilbert squares of surfaces
entry.summary: We prove stability of rank two tautological bundles on the Hilbert square of a surface (under a mild positivity condition) and compute their Chern classes.

entry.title: Aller-retour vers l'inseparable
entry.summary: We construct inseparable morphisms between curves of genus $\ge 2$ that are degenerations of separable morphisms.

entry.title: Finite subgroups of PGL(2,K)
entry.summary: We classify, up to conjugacy, the finite subgroups of PGL(2,K) of order prime to char(K).

entry.title: Defect via differential forms with logarithmic poles
entry.summary: We prove formulae for the Hodge numbers of big resolutions of singular hypersurfaces satisfying a Bott-type vanishing condition.

entry.title: The primitive cohomology lattice of a complete intersection
entry.summary: We describe the primitive cohomology lattice of a smooth even-dimensional complete intersection in projective space.

entry.title: The group of automorphisms of the Jacobian algebra $\mA_n$
entry.summary: The groups of automorphisms of the Jacobian algebras are found.

entry.title: Families of hypersurfaces of large degree
entry.summary: We show that general moving enough families of high enough degree hypersurfaces in a complex projective space do not have a dominant set of sections.

entry.title: Full exceptional collections on the Lagrangian Grassmannians LG(4,8) and LG(5,10)
entry.summary: We construct full exceptional collections of vector bundles on the Lagrangian Grassmannians LG(4,8) and LG(5,10).

entry.title: Moduli of Legendrian Curves
entry.summary: We construct the generic component of the moduli space of the germs of Legendrian curves with generic plane projection topologicaly equivalent to a curve y^n = x^m, (n,m)=1.

entry.title: Rigidity properties of Fano varieties
entry.summary: We overview some recent results on Fano varieties giving evidence of their rigid nature under small deformations.

entry.title: Special homogeneous linear systems on Hirzebruch surfaces - algorithmic issues
entry.summary: We present algorithms used in the computational part of the article "Special homogeneous linear systems on Hirzebruch surfaces".

entry.title: Semipositivity theorem for reducible algebraic fiber spaces
entry.summary: We shall prove an extension of the semipositivity theorem for the case of reducible algebraic fiber spaces.

entry.title: Reality and transversality for Schubert calculus in OG(n,2n+1)
entry.summary: We prove an analogue of the Mukhin-Tarasov-Varchenko theorem (formerly the Shapiro-Shapiro conjecture) for the maximal type B_n orthogonal Grassmannian OG(n,2n+1).

entry.title: On maximal Albanese dimensional varieties
entry.summary: We prove that every smooth projective variety with maximal Albanese dimension has a good minimal model. We also treat Ueno's problem on subvarieties of Abelian varieties.

entry.title: Generalization of Neron models of Green, Griffiths and Kerr
entry.summary: We explain some recent developments in the theory of Neron models for families of Jacobians associated to variations of Hodge structures of weight -1.

entry.title: Solution of the generalized periodic discrete Toda equation II; Theta function solution
entry.summary: We construct the theta function solution to the initial value problem for the generalized periodic discrete Toda equation.

entry.title: Log del Pezzo surfaces with simple automorphism groups
entry.summary: In this paper we consider del Pezzo surfaces with only log terminal singularities admitting an action of a finite simple group.

entry.title: The $Ï$-invariant and elimination
entry.summary: In this paper we present some results showing the good behavior of the $\tau$-invariant of a Rees algebra with integral closure and elimination (of variables).

entry.title: Euler characteristic and Lipschitz-Killing curvatures of closed semi-algebraic sets
entry.summary: We prove a formula that relates the Euler-Poincar\'e characteristic of a closed semi-algebraic set to its Lipschitz-Killing curvatures

entry.title: Explicit computations of Zariski decompositions on P_Z^1
entry.summary: In this note, we observe several properties of arithmetic divisors on the projective line over Z and give their Zariski decompositions.

entry.title: GL Verlinde numbers and the Grassmann TQFT
entry.summary: We give a brief exposition of the 2d TQFT that captures the structure of the GL Verlinde numbers, following Witten.

entry.title: Moduli space of Hessian K3 surfaces and arithmetic quotients
entry.summary: We study the moduli space of Hessian K3 surfaces as arithmetic quotients.

entry.title: Almost commuting matrices with respect to normalized Hilbert-Schmidt norm
entry.summary: Almost-commuting matrices with respect to the normalized Hilbert-Schmidt norm are considered. Normal almost commuting matrices are proved to be near commuting.

entry.title: Holomorphic symplectic geometry: a problem list
entry.summary: A list of open problems on holomorphic symplectic, contact and Poisson manifolds.

entry.title: Quantitative extensions of pluricanonical forms and closed positive currents
entry.summary: In this article we establish several Ohsawa-Takegoshi type theorems for twisted pluricanonical forms and metrics of adjoint $\bR$-bundles.

entry.title: The characteristic polynomials of abelian varieties of dimensions 3 over finite fields
entry.summary: We describe the set of characteristic polynomials of abelian varieties of dimension 3 over finite fields.

entry.title: Adequate moduli spaces and geometrically reductive group schemes
entry.summary: We develop the theory of adequate moduli spaces in characteristic $p$ (and mixed characteristic) characterizing quotients by geometrically reductive group schemes.

entry.title: Effectivity of Brauer-Manin obstructions on surfaces
entry.summary: We study Brauer-Manin obstructions to the Hasse principle and to weak approximation on algebraic surfaces over number fields.

entry.title: Non-commutative Laurent phenomenon for two variables
entry.summary: We prove the non-commutative Laurent phenomenon for two variables.

entry.title: Un critÃ¨re d'indÃ©pendance pour une famille de reprÃ©sentations l-adiques
entry.summary: We give a criterion for the " almost independence " of a family of l-adic representations.

entry.title: Bounds for the order for p-elementary subgroups in the plane Cremona group over a perfect field
entry.summary: We obtain a sharp bound for p-elementary subgroups in the plane Cremona group over an arbitrary perfect field.

entry.title: Bertini-type theorems for formal functions in grassmannians
entry.summary: The present note generalizes Debarre's Bertini-type results for in- verse images of Schubert varieties with the extension of formal func- tions.

entry.title: Integrality Properties of Open-Closed Mirror Maps
entry.summary: We propose a conjecture on integrality property of the open-closed mirror maps of compact Calabi-Yau manifolds. Some examples are presented.

entry.title: Equivariant Algebraic Cobordism
entry.summary: We construct an equivariant algebraic cobordism theory for schemes with an action by a linear algebraic group over a field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: Note on local structure of Artin stacks
entry.summary: In this note we show that an Artin stack with finite inertia stack is etale locally isomorphic to the quotient of an affine scheme by an action of a general linear group.

entry.title: Stringy mirror symmetry
entry.summary: We prove that the mirror pairs constructed by Batyrev and Borisov have stringy mirror symmetry.

entry.title: Moduli of varieties of general type
entry.summary: This is a survey paper discussing the moduli problem for varieties of general type.

entry.title: Self Rational Maps of K3 Surfaces
entry.summary: We prove that a very general projective K3 surface does not admit a dominant self rational map of degree at least two.

entry.title: Finiteness results for 3-folds with semiample anticanonical bundle
entry.summary: We prove some finiteness results on the movable cone for mildly singular 3-folds with semiample anticanonical bundle, giving some evidence for the Morrison--Kawamata cone conjecture for klt pairs.

entry.title: Standard Monomial Theory of RR varieties
entry.summary: We construct the RR varieties as the fiber products of Bott-Samelson varieties over Richardson varieties. We study their homogeneous coordinate rings and standard monomial theory.

entry.title: Vector bundles on elliptic curves and factors of automorphy
entry.summary: We translate the Atiyah's results on classification of vector bundles on elliptic curves to the language of factors of automorphy.

entry.title: Notes on projective normality of reducible curves
entry.summary: We give some results on quadratic normality of reducible curves canonically embedded and partially extend this study to their projective normality.

entry.title: Recasting results in equivariant geometry: affine cosets, observable subgroups and existence of good quotients
entry.summary: Using the language of stacks, we recast and generalize a selection of results in equivariant geometry.

entry.title: Local systems on proper algebraic V-manifolds
entry.summary: We use coverings by smooth projective varieties then apply nonabelian Hodge techniques to study the topology of proper Deligne-Mumford stacks as well as more general simplicial varieties.

entry.title: Frobenius pull backs of principal $G$-bundles and their canonical parabolics
entry.summary: The paper is withdrawn.

entry.title: Cobordism ring of toric varieties
entry.summary: We describe the equivariant cobordism ring of smooth toric varieties. This equivariant description is used to compute the ordinary cobordism ring of such varieties.

entry.title: A remark on primitive cycles and the Radon transform
entry.summary: We show that the use of Brylinski's Radon transform elucidates some points of the Green-Griffiths approach to the Hodge conjecture.

entry.title: Conformal blocks divisors on $\bar{M}_{0,n}$ from $sl_2$
entry.summary: We study a family of semiample divisors on $\bar{M}_{0,n}$ defined using conformal blocks and analyze their associated morphisms.

entry.title: Global generation of the direct images of relative pluricanonical systems
entry.summary: We prove global generation of the direct images of relative pluricanonical systems of sufficiently large and divisible multiples over the complement of the discriminant locus.

entry.title: The rationality of the moduli spaces of trigonal curves of odd genus
entry.summary: The moduli spaces of trigonal curves of odd genus $g>4$ are proven to be rational.

entry.title: A note on the Frobenius morphism on toric varieties
entry.summary: We give a new, shorter computation of Frobenius push-forwards of line bundles on toric varieties.

entry.title: A remark on the abundance conjecture
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn by the author due to a crucial error.
entry.arxiv:comment: The paper has been withdrawn by the author due to a crucial error

entry.title: Ãtale cohomology of schemes and analytic spaces
entry.summary: Those are notes of a mini-course the author gave in July 2010 at the university Paris 6 (Jussieu) during the summer school of the ANR (Agence nationale de la recherche) BERKO.

entry.title: Del Pezzo surfaces with many symmetries
entry.summary: We classify smooth del Pezzo surfaces whose alpha-invariant of Tian is bigger than one.

entry.title: The characteristic polynomials of abelian varieties of dimensions 4 over finite fields
entry.summary: We describe the set of characteristic polynomials of abelian varieties of dimension 4 over finite fields.

entry.title: Minimal free resolutions and Betti diagrams of the algebras of $SL_2$-invariants
entry.summary: For the algebras of $SL_2$-invariants of small homological dimension theirs minimal free graded resolutions and graded Betti diagrams calculated.

entry.title: On a question of Sean Keel
entry.summary: We answer a question of Sean Keel in the affirmative in the case of ruled surfaces
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra

entry.title: Singularities of stable varieties
entry.summary: This is a survey on recent results regarding singularities that occur on higher dimensional stable varieties.
entry.arxiv:comment: to appear in Handbook of Moduli

entry.title: Non-rationality of the symmetric sextic Fano threefold
entry.summary: We give a simple proof of the non-rationality of the Fano threefold defined by the equations \Sigma x_i = \Sigma x_i^2 = \Sigma x_i^3 = 0 in P^6 .

entry.title: Hilbert polynomials of the algebras of $SL_2$-invariants
entry.summary: We offer a Maple-procedure for computing of the Hilbert polynomials of the algebras of $SL_2$-invariants

entry.title: Semicontinuity of the Åojasiewicz exponent
entry.summary: We prove that the {\L}ojasiewicz exponent $l_0(f)$ of a finite holomorphic germ $f:(C^n,0)\to(C^n,0)$ is lower semicontinuous in any multiplicity-constant deformation of $f$.

entry.title: Theorems on tangencies in projective and convex geometry
entry.summary: We discuss various phenomena of tangency in projective and convex geometry.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages. Detailed proofs will appear in a forthcoming paper

entry.title: Supplement to classification of three-fold divisorial contractions
entry.summary: Every three-fold divisorial contraction to a non-Gorenstein point is a weighted blow-up.

entry.title: Notes on Virtual Fundamental Classes
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: Countability properties of some Berkovich spaces
entry.summary: We prove that any compact Berkovich space over the field of Laurent series over an arbitrary field is angelic. In particular, is it sequentially compact.

entry.title: Hodge theory on generalized normal crossing varieties
entry.summary: We generalize some results in Hodge theory to generalized normal crossing varieties.

entry.title: Elliptic K3 surfaces admitting a Shioda-Inose structure
entry.summary: We study elliptic K3 surfaces with Mordell Weil rank 0, and which has a 2-torsion section $\sigma$ such that the translation by $\sigma$ gives a Shioda-Inose structure.

entry.title: A Class of Noncommutative Spectra
entry.summary: We construct a class of noncommutative spectra and give the basic properties of the class of noncommutative spectra.

entry.title: New examples of terminal and log canonical singularities
entry.summary: We give new examples of terminal and log canonical singularities.

entry.title: Makar-Limanov invariant, Derksen invariant, flexible points
entry.summary: We estabilish some connections among the Makar-Limanov invariant, the Derksen invariant, and the existence of flexible points on an affine variety.

entry.title: Local Donaldson-Thomas invariants of Blowups of surfaces
entry.summary: Using the degeneration formula for Donaldson-Thomas invariants, we proved a formula for the change of Donaldson-Thomas invariants of local surfaces under blowing up along points.

entry.title: Equations describing the ramification of outer simple linear projections
entry.summary: We explain how to determine equations describing the ramification of an outer simple linear projection of a projective scheme in a way suited for explicit computations.

entry.title: On the structure of Demailly-Semple invariant jet differentials
entry.summary: A short explanation of the complexity of the structure of Demailly-semple invariant jet differentials was given

entry.title: A question on image of syntomic regulator on CH^2(X,1)
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: Motivic Donaldson-Thomas invariants of toric small crepant resolutions
entry.summary: We compute the motivic Donaldson-Thomas theory of small crepant resolutions of toric Calabi-Yau 3-folds.

entry.title: Nine-dimensional exceptional quotient singularities exist
entry.summary: We prove that nine-dimensional exceptional quotient singularities exist.

entry.title: Fano Hypersurfaces in Positive Characteristic
entry.summary: We prove that a general Fano hypersurface in a projective space over an algebraically closed field of arbitrary characteristic is separably rationally connected.

entry.title: Manifolds with nef cotangent bundle
entry.summary: Generalising a classical theorem by Ueno, we prove structure results for manifolds with nef or semiample cotangent bundle.

entry.title: Obstruction theories and virtual fundamental classes
entry.summary: We give a new definition of an obstruction theory for infinitesimal deformation theory and relate it to earlier definitions of Artin, Fantechi-Manetti, Li-Tian, and Behrend-Fantechi.

entry.title: System of Resultants as a collection of coefficients of a unique Resultant
entry.summary: I give the explicit formula for the (set-theoretical) system of Resultants of m+1 homogeneous polynomials in n+1 variables.

entry.title: A Remark on Rigidity of BN-sheaves
entry.summary: We give a simple proof for the rigidity of a complex in the bounded derived category of sheaves with constructible cohomology on an abelian variety.

entry.title: The fundamental group is not a derived invariant
entry.summary: We show that the fundamental group is not invariant under derived equivalence of smooth projective varieties.
entry.arxiv:comment: A paper from a few months ago which I forgot to post

entry.title: Galois theory and projective geometry
entry.summary: We explore connections between birational anabelian geometry and abstract projective geometry. One of the applications is a proof of a version of the birational section conjecture.

entry.title: A non-boundary nef divisor on $\bar{M}_{0,12}$
entry.summary: We describe a nef divisor $D_P$ on $\bar{M}_{0,12}$ that is not numerically equivalent to an effective sum of boundary divisors.

entry.title: Equivariant Cohomology of Infinite-Dimensional Grassmannian and Shifted Schur Functions
entry.summary: We study the multiplication and comultiplication in equivariant cohomology of Sato Grassmannian

entry.title: Mori contractions of maximal length
entry.summary: We prove a relative version of the theorem of Cho, Miyaoka and Shepherd-Barron: a Mori fibre space of maximal length is birational to a projective bundle.

entry.title: Invariant Forms for Correspondences of Curves
entry.summary: In this article, we study the invariant differential forms which a correspondence of curves admits. We also try to classify the correspondences of $\mathbb{P}^1$ that admits such invariant differential forms.

entry.title: Effective finite generation for adjoint rings
entry.summary: We describe a bound on the degree of the generators for some adjoint rings on surfaces and threefolds.

entry.title: Manifolds over Cayley-Dickson algebras and their immersions
entry.summary: Holomorphic manifolds over Cayley-Dickson algebras are defined and their embeddings and immersions are studied.

entry.title: On the Rigidity of BN-sheaves
entry.summary: We define monoidal components attached to perverse sheaves on abelian varieties and discuss their properties.

entry.title: On Isomorphisms of Grassmann Spaces
entry.summary: We exhibit isomorphisms of Grassmann spaces and their relationship with collineations and embeddings of the underlying projective spaces.

entry.title: Affine Circle Geometry over Quaternion Skew Fields
entry.summary: We investigate the a{\pm}ne circle geometry arising from a quaternion skew field and one of its maximal commutative subfields.

entry.title: Rigidity index preservation of regular holonomic D-modules
entry.summary: This paper shows algebraically that the Fourier transform preserves the rigidity index of irreducible regular holonomic $\mathcal{D}_{\mathbb{P}^1}[*\{\infty\}]$-modules.

entry.title: Semiorthogonal decompositions for twisted grassmannians
entry.summary: In this article, we present semiorthogonal decompositions for twisted forms of grassmannians

entry.title: Syzygies and equations of Kummer varieties
entry.summary: We study property $N_p$ for Kummer varieties embedded by a power of an ample line bundle.

entry.title: A particular case of the Jacobian conjecture
entry.summary: A particular case of the Jacobian conjecture is considered and for small dimensional cases a computational approach is offered

entry.title: Ideal-adic semi-continuity of minimal log discrepancies on surfaces
entry.summary: We prove the ideal-adic semi-continuity of minimal log discrepancies on surfaces.

entry.title: Classification of 2-Fano manifolds with high index
entry.summary: In this paper we classify n-dimensional Fano manifolds with index >=n-2 and positive second Chern character.

entry.title: Real Liouville extensions
entry.summary: We give a characterization of real Liouville extensions by differential Galois groups.

entry.title: On 6-canonical map of irregular threefolds of general type
entry.summary: We prove that, for any nonsingular projective irregular 3-fold of general type, the 6-canonical map is birational onto its image.

entry.title: Smooth quartic K3 surfaces and Cremona transformations, II
entry.summary: This is a continuation of [Og12], concerning automorphisms of smooth quartic K3 surfaces and birational automorphisms of ambient projective three spaces.

entry.title: Tetrahedral quartics in Projective Space
entry.summary: We study tetrahedral quartics in projective space. We address their projective geometry, Neron-Severi lattice and automorphism group.

entry.title: On a Question of B. Teissier
entry.summary: We answer positively a question of B. Teissier on existence of resolution of singularities inside an equivariant map of toric varieties.

entry.title: ACC for log canonical thresholds
entry.summary: We show that log canonical thresholds satisfy the ACC

entry.title: On almost holomorphic Lagrangian fibrations
entry.summary: We prove that the pull back of an ample line bundle by an almost holomorphic Lagrangian fibration is nef. As an application, we show birational semi rigidity of Lagrangian fibrations.

entry.title: On the regularity of special difference divisors
entry.summary: In this note we prove that the difference divisors associated with special cycles on unitary Rapoport-Zink spaces of signature (1,n-1) in the unramified case are always regular.

entry.title: Monodromy of subvarieties of PEL-Shimura varieties
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to generalize results of C.-L. Chai about the monodromy of Hecke invariant subvarieties to Shimura varieties of PEL-type.

entry.title: An Injectivity Theorem
entry.summary: We generalize the injectivity theorem of Esnault and Viehweg, and apply it to the structure of log canonical type divisors.

entry.title: Hermitian forms of K3 type
entry.summary: We classify quadratic spaces over endomorphism fields of K3 surfaces. We consider both totally real and CM cases.

entry.title: Endomorphism algebras of Kuga-Satake varieties
entry.summary: We compute endomorphism algebras of Kuga-Satake varieties associated to K3 surfaces.
entry.arxiv:comment: An error in the Example section was corrected

entry.title: The index of a threefold canonical singularity
entry.summary: The index of a 3-fold canonical singularity at a crepant centre is at most 6.

entry.title: The Hasse principle for 9-nodal cubic threefolds
entry.summary: We prove that the Hasse principle holds for cubic threefolds with 9 singular points over a number field.

entry.title: On the geometry of spherical varieties
entry.summary: Survey article on the geometry of spherical varieties. Invited survey for Transformation Groups.
